name: ng2-conventions-decorators
description: A set of minimal decorators for Angular2 that leverage established conventions to reduce boilerplate, improve maintainability, and improve type safety

scripts.test:amd: tsc test/index.ts --module amd --target es6 --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata && npm run test
scripts.test:commonjs: tsc test/index.ts --module commonjs --target es6 --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata && npm run test

author: aluanh@gmail.com
